text.body:
On the occasion of the South African National Multiple Sclerosis Society's 30th Anniversary I would like to convey my sincere greetings to all your members.
I commend all efforts in supporting persons with multiple sclerosis.
I hope that international research will soon provide some answers to the cause, and, ultimately, to a cure of this disease.
I wish you all every success in your endeavours.
Signed by Nelson Mandela
President Republic of South Africa
